talk.author: did:plc:jptpbv2h66v44e7tdkz2mocn
talk.utter: You have made them the same thing by attacking Jews.

talk.author: did:plc:7ih2ud7d5wjbzyxrksyoz24t
talk.utter: I said it before, I'll say it again. I already don't support any Abrahamic religions. If they can't have religion without genocide, maybe the people getting fucking murdered aren't the problem

talk.author: did:plc:7ih2ud7d5wjbzyxrksyoz24t
talk.utter: Then why do they constantly talk about the Jewish religion? Why is Judaism brought up to defend Zionism? Even if your point has merit, you're deflecting a religious genocide to an ethnic cleansing.

talk.author: did:plc:jptpbv2h66v44e7tdkz2mocn
talk.utter: “They” is a pretty broad brush. The same one the Nazis used.
